dct_title_s: Sketch of public surveys in New Mexico, 1863 [to accompany the annual report of the Surveyor General for 1863]
dct_description_sm: United States Surveyor Generals Office in New Mexico, John A. Clark.
Shows townships subdivided, private and Pueblo Indian grants surveyed.
dct_creator_sm: United States, Surveyor General of New Mexico.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
